title: seriousbuyer01
author: seriousbuyer01
content: Our company needs to buy HUGE amounts of bitcoins... either once, or on a daily basis! We need a company or individual who can handle this kind of transactions. We are kyc and cis ready ... so please be as well. We are looking to buy upto 3000 bitcoins if possible. Kindly get back to me if you ready to sell me some reasonable amounts right away. Serious sellers only; and how to reach you.Regards.

comments.author: CryptoRollaOTC
comments.created_time: February 26, 2023, 11:16:33 AMLast edit: February 26, 2023, 11:27:23 AM by CryptoRollaOTC
comments.body: Hey, we are direct intake for several licensed trade platforms. Also we have access to private miners and sellers with deep liquidity and we can provide bulk quantity/(BTC) at discount for large amount of coins.We qualify whether client is a REAL and RWA and if he is genuine we'll get him a comprehensive program. So If your company have a genuine need and capacity to purchase we'd be happy to assist.here you can find a link to usKind regards,CryptoRolla team
